directions: Thread each toothpick with: one tomato, 1/4 of a slice of prosciutto folded into a small square, one mozzarella ball, one basil leaf (folded if it is large), and one more tomato.
Arrange appetizers on a serving platter.  Drizzle with your favorite Italian salad dressing.
ingredients: 48 cherry or grape tomatoes, rinsed and dried
6 thin slices  prosciutto, each cut into quarters
title: Mozzarella and Tomato Appetizer
